Item ID12279

Mithril platelegs (g) is a part of mithril gold-trimmed armour and a reward from medium Treasure Trails. They have the same stats as regular Mithril platelegs, and require level 20 Defence to wear. This item cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-21-11
 Defence bonuses
+24+22+20-4+22
 Other bonusesSlot

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The platelegs's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -7 to -11.

[[File:Mithril platelegs (g) detail.png|left|90px]]
'''Mithril platelegs (g)''' is a part of [[mithril gold-trimmed armour]] and a reward from [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium]] [[Treasure Trails]]. They have the same stats as regular [[Mithril platelegs]], and require level 20 [[Defence]] to wear. This item '''cannot''' be made via the [[Smithing]] skill.
